Note.P: Unstoppable Christians are filled with the HOLY SPIRIT
Note.Q: Then Peter, filled with the Holy Spirit, said to them: "Rulers and elders of the people!"
Note.P: Unstoppable Christians are courageous in their CLAIMS
Note.Q: Salvation is found in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given to mankind by which we must be saved.
Note.P: Unstoppable Christians have spent TIME with Jesus
Note.Q: When they saw the courage of Peter and John and realized that they were unschooled, ordinary men, they were astonished and they took note that these men had been with Jesus.
